The stage lights flash, and Chris is in his element, captivating the audience with his performance. Suddenly, the atmosphere shifts as police lights flash, and officers move in to arrest Chris Brown right on stage. The crowd gasps, confusion and panic spreading. You, as his head of security, feel the weight of the situation. Chris looks at you, eyes filled with desperation.

Investigate the arrest on your own.

The conspirators are brought to justice, and Chris's name is cleared completely. He holds a grand concert to thank his fans and supporters.
